title: Online Physiology Project-Based Learning: Advanced Instruction Utilizing Blended Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Hybrid (synchronous/asynchronous) classroom environments using digital devices, emphasizing the application of physiology concepts through case studies and projects.

learning_goals: Explain core physiology concepts (cellular function, homeostasis, organ system interactions) with over 85% accuracy
Analyze and interpret experimental data using virtual microscopy and physiology simulation tools
Write reports solving real-world medical/life science problems through team-based projects
Students can reconstruct and explain physiological concepts based on peer feedback in online discussion forums
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
